## RequiredProps type

Given an object type, make one or more properties non-optional

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RequiredProps<T, K extends keyof T> = T & {
    [L in K]-?: T[K];
};
```

## Example


```ts

interface Foo {
  a?: string;
  b?: boolean;
  c?: number[];
}

const x: RequiredProps<Foo, 'a' | 'b'> = {
  a: 'hello world',    // now required
  b: true              // now required
  c: [1, 2, 3]         // still optional
};

```
